author: Laura Cooper
title: Firm Weighs Sale of Therapy Brands
text:
The growth unit of Providence Equity Partners is weighing a possible sale of Therapy Brands, a provider of behavioral-health software, as private-equity firms continue to flock to behavioral health deals.
The company, which is projected to generate $18 million of pro forma earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization for 2018, retained investment bank Harris Williams & Co. to explore a sale, said people familiar with the situation.
...
